title: Non-BPS branes and continuous symmetries
authors:
Oren Bergman, Eduardo Garcia-Valdecasas, Francesco Mignosa, Diego
  Rodriguez-Gomez
abstract:
We propose a holographic description of the operators implementing $U(1)$
global symmetries that are dual to superstring gauge fields in terms of non-BPS
D-branes. We check the consistency of our proposal in a number of examples.
